body.name: LENNYVILLNA Dresser for Bedroom, Tall Dresser with 8 Drawers, Wide Chest of Drawers, Fabric Dresser for Closet, Storage Tower with Fabric Bins, Modern Dresser for Living Room, Hallway, Nursery
body.stockDetail: Only 14 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 20 hrs 40 mins
features: 【Sturdy and Durable】This small dresser is made of alloy steel frame, MDF wooden wearproof countertop and high-grade non-woven breathable fabric, which offers reliable strength and stability. The dressers for bedroom has anti-tip kit to prevent incidents.

【Roomy Storage Space】This bedroom dresser measures 11.7"D x 30.5"W x 47.8"H. The fabric dresser is designed with 9 separate collapsible drawers, which provides large storage space and is ideal for home organizing.

【8 Drawers Chest】This chest of drawers features artistic geometry pattern on the fabric drawers and easy-to-pull knob handles help open and close the drawers smoothly. The closet dresser will match your furniture perfectly, and selected materials ensure years of use of the dresser.

【Multifunction Dresser】This wood dresser is ideal for wherever you want to keep clutter under control, such as bedroom, nursery, closet, entryway, dorm, living room; and matches perfectly with other storage furniture.

【Easy to Assemble】The packages will come with all the tools and accessories; Detailed instructions and the installation video will help you for quick assembly. If you have encountered any problems with our 8 drawer dresser, please feel free to contact us, your satisfaction is our first priority.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble! I bought it for my son, and he loves it! Makes his room nice and bright!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars look decent in person
reviews.reviewText: smaller than expected but I need them plus it took longer than expected to receive this product.. somewhat easy to assemble but the directions are not that great TBH you'll easily go the wrong side if you don't catch the mistake.. solid but I wouldn't trust it with something super heavy like over 30lbs on the top (btw that's not super heavy lol) so far so good.. 60 bucks isn't bad but isn't great either..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice and is slender
reviews.reviewText: The quality is as pictured, easy to assemble, colors are good.I like the depth, it doesn’t stick out too far, very slim line and looks good.Almost makes a bit of an artistic statement and all the colors help it go with any color scheme.Would be great for inside a closet for people who need more storage space tooMy teen son likes it very much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s fits all the description of the product
reviews.reviewText: I like this idea to have all in the same place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dresser that POPS with color!
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is very sturdy. I have it in my kitchen holding the overflow of all my cupboards. It’s filled with storage bags, small appliances, trash bag refills, disinfectant wipes, etc. one drawer is specifically for junk food. That way it stays off my countertops. It’s a great space-saving organizer. Regardless of what you wish to use it for. Made well. Easy to put together. Worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: works really well and easy to put together, holds alot of stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Organize in style with the LENNYVILLNA Dresser!
reviews.reviewText: Hey there! I wanted to share my latest purchase with you. I just got this amazing tall dresser with 8 drawers and it's a true gem that I'm absolutely in love with! It looks fantastic in my bedroom and adds an elegant touch to my living space as well. The fabric bins and modern design are just amazing and they provide ample storage, which is exactly what I needed. The assembly was effortless and the quality is exceptional. I'm so impressed with the versatility of this piece, it combines functionality with aesthetics, making it a perfect addition to any room in the house. I'm really happy with my purchase and I would definitely recommend the LENNYVILLNA Dresser to anyone who's looking for an elegant and practical storage solution. It's definitely worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The dresser is pretty sturdy at least the frame of the dresser since it’s metal but the cabinets could be so much better. After awhile the seams start coming loose on the sides and they start bulging outwards making it hard to pull the drawers out or push them back in.
